venue.name: Red Lentil Vegetarian and Vegan Restaurant

item.description: The Red Lentil on Temple Street (on the same block as the Criterion Cinema) is a new restaurant (2011) that has absolutely amazing fare! I have a hankering for some hearty food, and fear not, they have it! If you're looking for steak or seafood, perhaps this isn't the venue for you. But if you're looking for something original, unique, and tasty, join me for dinner at 6:30pm. I promise you won't leave hungry! This may be the perfect way to wind down from a crazy weekend... dinner out with friends. :)
item.name: Dinner Jan 1 at Red Lentil 6:30pm
